name: BioShock Challenge Rooms
summary:
This exclusive Playstation 3 add-on for BioShock includes three different challenge rooms in different locations from the main storyline which are introduced with a comic book cover done by Sander Cohen in the style of 1950s EC Comics. 
 
The 'I' in Team is set on the Rapture Firing Range and involves trying to defeat a Big Daddy without any weapons or offensive Plasmids. 
 
A Shocking Turn of Events is set on a Ferris wheel and involves rescuing a Little Sister who is stuck at the top. Without using the Electro Bolt, you must activate the Ferris wheel controls using different weapons and Gene Tonics. Instant Piano Prodigy is a new Tonic that can also be found. 
 
Worlds of Hurt takes place in a series of combat rooms with different enemies. Clear a room to win money and ADAM so you can buy new ammo and Plasmids. 
 
A new Game+ mode also lets you replay the main game with any abilities, inventory, and weapons that you collected previously. There are 12 new trophies to acquire.
